element_type.name: Pull Quote
element_type.description: A pull quote element

element_type.name: FAQ Question
element_type.description: A single FAQ question and its answer.

element_type.name: FAQ Section
element_type.description: A section of an FAQ.

element_type.name: Link to Download
element_type.description: Link to a file to download.

element_type.name: Link to Screenshot Image
element_type.description: A link to an image used in a screenshot.

element_type.name: Nav Link
element_type.description: Link to a document used for the site nav bar.

element_type.name: External Nav Link
element_type.description: Link to an external URL used in the nav bar.

element_type.name: Nav Menu Item
element_type.description: A single nav menu and its submenus.

element_type.name: List
element_type.description: An ordered or unordered list.

element_type.name: Related Audio
element_type.description: Relates an audio file to the document.

element_type.name: Related Image
element_type.description: Relates an image to the document.

element_type.name: Related Links
element_type.description: Links to related stories.

element_type.name: Screenshot
element_type.description: A screenshot.

element_type.name: Archive
element_type.description: Archive of all stories on the site or in a category and all of its subcategories.

element_type.name: Downloads
element_type.description: The site downloads page.

element_type.name: FAQ
element_type.description: Frequently asked questions.

element_type.name: Home Page
element_type.description: Site home page.

element_type.name: Screenshots
element_type.description: Screenshots.

element_type.name: Fixed Document
element_type.description: Fixed location document.

element_type.name: Article
element_type.description: Dated article.

element_type.name: Nav Menu
element_type.description: Site navigation menu.

element_type.name: Image
element_type.description: An image file.

element_type.name: Fixed Image
element_type.description: Fixed location image file.

element_type.name: Static File
element_type.description: CSS, JavaScript, SSI, etc.

element_type.name: Audio
element_type.description: Audio file.

element_type.name: Download Shortcut
element_type.description: A simple link to a downloadable file.

element_type.name: Download Branch
element_type.description: A download branch, with links to all the releases in the branch.

element_type.name: Related Document Link
element_type.description: Link to a story document related to the current document.

element_type.name: Related External Link
element_type.description: Link to an external URL that's related to the current document.

element_type.name: Personal Profile
element_type.description: The profile of data about a person, such as a Bricolage developer.

element_type.name: Roster
element_type.description: List of personal profiles of people involved in the project.

element_type.name: Site Profile
element_type.description: The profile of a site powered by Bricolage

element_type.name: Sites
element_type.description: List of sites powered by Bricolage

element_type.name: Mailing List
element_type.description: Information about a mailing list

element_type.name: Mailing Lists
element_type.description: A list of mailing lists.

element_type.name: Download
element_type.description: Downloadable files, such as a release of Bricolage.

element_type.name: Changes
element_type.description: List of changes in a Bricolage release.

element_type.name: Link to Document Item
element_type.description: List item link to another Bricolage document.

element_type.name: External Link Item
element_type.description: List item link to a URL not managed in Bricolage.

element_type.name: Block Quote
element_type.description: Inline extended quotation.

element_type.name: External Link Button
element_type.description: An image that links to URL.

element_type.name: Related Document Button
element_type.description: Outputs an image as link to another document.

element_type.name: Document Models
element_type.description: For the creation of a list of document models.
